name: R5_v3_ClinicalResearchReason_for_R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R5.ClinicalResearchReason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ClinicalResearchReason|2.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4B.

concept.display: administered outside recommended schedule or practice
waiting for old drug to wash out
family physician must authorize further fills
patient no longer in this practice
clinical trial research without patient care
clinical trial research with patient care
population origins or ancestry healthcare research

contains.display: administered outside recommended schedule or practice
waiting for old drug to wash out
family physician must authorize further fills
patient no longer in this practice
clinical trial research without patient care
clinical trial research with patient care
population origins or ancestry healthcare research
